file_content.text: Those Colicoids are still scuttling in all directions. Good job.
Our bombers are pounding those Colicoid nests into toxic dust. You do excellent work.
Thanks for your help--you've certainly earned this.
I'm afraid we need all those markers in place before we bombard the area.
You see, we're setting up a new base of operations where Outpost Freedom is now, but those Colicoids are proving a headache.
Our orbital bombers have specialized toxic bombs to drive them off, but apparently they need infrared markers to aim at. I'm looking for someone to place those markers.
If this was so simple, you'd have placed those markers by now.
What's the catch?
Well, there are a ton of Colicoid nests in that area, but nothing you can't handle.
I won't do it for free.
For you, I'm sure an appropriate reward can be arranged.
Not much of a challenge....
Did I mention the markers must be placed near nests of swarming Colicoids?
We need the markers placed in these locations. Once they're all in place, I can order the bombardment.
I can take care of it.
Warn me first. If I look up and see toxic bombs overhead, I will be... unhappy.
Just let me get out in time.
I'll contact you when I read the markers are in place. Watch yourself around the Colicoids.
My concerns are of galactic importance. Seek someone else.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
I'm sure this is important, but I have business elsewhere.
No, thank you. [Refuse quest]
I understand. Thank you for your time.
Can't talk now, I'm afraid. Colicoid problems.
I was hoping you'd have a moment, my lord. Commander Geates spoke highly of your work on the Republic relay stations.
Weren't you the one Commander Geates hired to attack the Republic relay stations? I could use your help.
Commander Geates said you dismantled those Republic relay stations with barely a scratch. Could you assist me?
